attributeslib.gui.press_shift: 쉬프트 키를 꾹 눌려 많은 정보를 봅니다.
attribute.name.generic.armor_toughness.d: Reduces the effectiveness of enemy armor reduction.
attribute.name.generic.attack_damage.des: Physical damage dealt with a fully charged attack.
How far your melee attacks knock back foes, in half-blocks.
attribute.name.generic.attack_speed.desc: How many fully charged attacks you can execute per second.
attribute.name.generic.luck.desc: Increases the likelihood of good things happening.
attribute.name.generic.max_health.desc: How many hit points you can have.
forge.entity_reach.desc: How far you can interact with entities, in blocks.
forge.entity_gravity.desc: Acceleration towrds the ground, in blocks/s²
forge.name_tag_distance.desc: How far away another player must be to see your name.
forge.block_reach.desc: How far you can interact with blocks, in blocks.
forge.step_height.desc: How many blocks you may step up without jumping.
forge.swim_speed.desc: How fast you swim, relative to normal.
attributeslib:draw_speed.desc: 활, 쇠뇌, 삼지창 같은 원거리 무기를 뽑는 속도를 빠르게 뽑는 지에
attributeslib:crit_chance.desc: 당신이 가한 치명타가 치명타 피해에 따라 추가 피해를 가합니다.
attributeslib:crit_damage.desc: 바닐라 점프 치명타를 포함한 치명타 피해 배율을 조정합니다.
attributeslib:cold_damage.desc: 근접 공격에 추가 마법 피해가 적용되고, 적중 시 적의 속도가 느려지게 만듭니다.
attributeslib:fire_damage.desc: 근접 공격에 추가 마법 피해가 적용되고, 적중 시 적을 불태우게 만듭니다.
attributeslib:life_steal.desc: Percentage of post-mitigation damage which will heal you.
attributeslib:current_hp_damage.desc: 대상의 체력에 따라 근접 공격의 물리 피해를 추가로 적용합니다.
attributeslib:overheal.desc: Percentage of post-mitigation damage which will grant you an absorption shield.
attributeslib:mining_speed.desc: 평소와 비교하여 블록을 빠르게 채굴하는 속도입니다.
attributeslib:arrow_damage.desc: 화살의 피해 배율. 삼지창도 화살로 취급합니다.
attributeslib:arrow_velocity.desc: 화살의 속도 배율. 속도에 따라 화살 피해가 증가합니다.
attributeslib:experience_gained.desc: Multiplier on how much experience you gain from breaking blocks and killing mobs.
attributeslib:armor_pierce.desc: Flat reduction to the target's armor value.
attributeslib:armor_shred.desc: Percentage reduction to the target's armor value.
attributeslib:prot_pierce.desc: Flat reduction to the target's protection point total.
attributeslib:prot_shred.desc: Percentage reduction to the target's protection point total.
attributeslib:dodge_chance.desc: Chance to dodge a melee attack or a projectile.
attributeslib:elytra_flight.desc: If you can fly as if wearing an Elytra.
attributeslib:creative_flight.desc: If you can fly as if in Creative Mode.
comment_id: MobFx - descriptions are duplicated for JEED support.
effect.attributeslib.knowledge.desc: Increases experience gained from kills and blocks.
effect.attributeslib.knowledge.descripti: Increases experience gained from kills and blocks.
effect.attributeslib.detonation.desc: On expiry, inflicts damage based on remaining fire ticks.
effect.attributeslib.detonation.descript: On expiry, inflicts damage based on remaining fire ticks.
effect.minecraft.night_vision.desc: Allows you to see in the dark.
effect.minecraft.fire_resistance.desc: Makes you immune to fire damage.
effect.minecraft.water_breathing.desc: Causes you to be unable to drown.
effect.minecraft.instant_health.desc: Instantly restores a bit of your health.
effect.minecraft.instant_damage.desc: Instantly causes a bit of magic damage.
effect.minecraft.regeneration.desc: Causes you to regenerate health over time.
death.attack.attributeslib:bleeding.play: %1$s bled out whilst trying to escape %2$s
death.attack.attributeslib:fire_damage.i: %1$s was scorched to death by %2$s using %3$s
death.attack.attributeslib:fire_damage.p: %1$s was scorched to death whilst fighting %2$s
death.attack.attributeslib:cold_damage.i: %1$s was frozen to death by %2$s using %3$s
death.attack.attributeslib:cold_damage.p: %1$s was frozen to death whilst fighting %2$s
